title: Boston Bikewatching
description: Interactive Mapbox + D3 visualization of Boston-area Bluebikes stations, bike lanes, and time-filtered traffic flow.

title: CNN — Recognizing numbers from hand signs
description: After preprocessing a dataset of hand-sign images, built a CNN that predicts the integer represented by a hand sign image.

title: Mandelbrot Set Viewer
description: A simple interactive Mandelbrot set viewer with pan/zoom for exploring complex-plane structure.

title: AutoMeet
description: Windows app to store class meeting times and automatically launch Zoom meetings on schedule.

title: Pi Approximator
description: Interactive visualizer of the Monte Carlo circle method to estimate π.

title: Interactive Chaos Theory
description: Interactive visualizers for chaotic systems (e.g., Lorenz Attractor, double pendulum).

title: Fourier Transform Visualizer
description: Interactive demo showing how Fourier transforms affect different signals.

title: Lottery Simulator
description: Simulate multiple lottery designs with custom conditions to explore expected outcomes.

title: ZSuite (Zeros Explorer)
description: A suite of visualizers and interactive apps for exploring the Riemann zeta function.

title: Interactive Game Theory
description: Interactive app to simulate strategies in classic games such as the Prisoners’ Dilemma.

title: HDLOpt — Automated HDL Unit-Level Verification Suite
description: Open-source suite for unit-level HDL verification with smart testbench generation, resource/timing/power/netlist/waveform analysis pipelines, and CI integrations. Lays groundwork for automated UVM testbench generation and simulation.

title: Agentic E2E Automated Software Development System
description: An end-to-end agentic automation ecosystem for client onboarding, contract generation, software deliverable production, and lifecycle management—targeting state-of-the-art SWE-Bench performance.

title: Street Maps Pathfinding
description: Pathfinding on real-world street maps with efficient graph search and interactive UI.
